Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms withsafe deposit boxes, WC & bath, direct dialing phone (ISDN line). 8 tartan tennis courts, 1 multi-court (volleyball, basketball, mini soccer), crazy golf, petanque and table tennis. Bungalows have either pool or garden view. Several of apartments have kitchen facilities and can accommodate up to 8 guests.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Situated in the historic town of Marathon Attica, 35km from the centre of Athens, 4km from the town of Nea Makri. Nearest airport: 40 min drive from Eleftherios Venizelos Airport.
